subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|ダイダイ}} {{wp|Daidai}} {{wp|Bitter orange}} [[File:Citrus_aurantium.jpg|thumb]]
{{ja-kanjitab|だいだい|yomi=k}} * {{sense|bitter orange}} {{ja-l|臭橙}}, {{ja-l|回青橙}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Thought to be derived from {{m|ja|代代|tr=daidai||[[many]] [[generation]]s}}, from the way [[bitter orange]] [[fruit]]s never fall down, even in [[winter]], until picked.<ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="DJR"/>
